revised_title: A Case of Polypus at the Heart and Scirrhous Tumor of the Uterus
tldr: The author presents a case study of a woman with a polypus at the heart and a scirrhous tumor of the uterus. The patient's body was examined post-mortem, revealing a large, hard swelling in the uterus and three distinct protuberances. The case is compared to similar observations made by Ruysch, with differences noted in the size, number, and nature of the tumors.
